SELECT member_nickname, member_image FROM MEMBER WHERE member_no = #{member_no}

SELECT c.room_no , m.member_nickname , m.member_no AS chat_to , m.member_image , m.member_state_no , c.chat_content , c.chat_time , (SELECT c2.chat_read FROM chat c2 WHERE c2.room_no = c.room_no AND (c2.room_no, c2.chat_time) IN (SELECT room_no , Max(chat_time) AS CHAT_TIME FROM chat WHERE chat_to = #{member_no} GROUP BY room_no)) AS chat_read FROM chat c, member m WHERE (c.room_no, c.chat_time) IN (SELECT room_no, MAX(chat_time) AS chat_time FROM chat WHERE chat_from = #{member_no} OR chat_to = #{member_no} GROUP BY room_no) AND DECODE(c.chat_from, #{member_no}, c.chat_to, c.chat_from) = m.member_no ORDER BY c.chat_time DESC
